Сеть Wi-Fi (по умолчанию) не найдена.\n\nИзмените настройки Wi-Fi и подключите оборудование к сети по умолчанию при помощи Сервисного Ключа.

Нет подключения с Сервисным Ключом.

 Подождите 20с во время запуска Сервисного Ключа.
ls Возможно, другой теплогенератор использует Сервисный Ключ.
Теплогенератор не найден.\n\nПодсоедините Сервисный Ключ к теплогенератору и включите его.

To forced CH request after OT communication fail (E83 - range=0, 1, 2)

Combustion function activation (bit0=auto test - bit1=max speed reduction - bit2=ripple check - bit3=combustion autoregulation - bit4=wind test - bit5=stop fan for wrongcombustion level - bit6=skip test 6000rpm after flame loss - bit7=ignition parameters setting by EEPROM)
Function activation (bit0=1 Imod level checking Off - bit2=1 obstruction/wind control disable)
Service due parameter (6..25 - 25 disable service due)
CH offset setpoint in DHW for HS=5,8,15,18
CH offset setpoint in DHW for HS=5,8,15,18 (15..35°C) (Sp_CH_in DHW=Sp_DHW+Offset)
Flow temperature OFF value in DHW for HS=5,8,15,18
Flow temperature OFF value in DHW for HS=5,8,15,18 (80..90°C)
Offset CH (CH setpoint for nuvola regulation HS=6,16 (-20..20°C))
LTU36 counter reload value after daily reset (3..15)
Pump activation delay after 3WV for HS=5,6,8 (0..20s)
Aux relay activation with DHW request
Aux relay activation with DHW request (F04/F05=10)
Burner switch on delay after heating request - not active in instantaneous DHW (0..255sec)
Power up application visualization (0..1: 0=sw version 1=sw version - hwd version - application version)
DHW switch off offset (0..15°C 0=fixed off value 1..15 Off=DHW setpoint+F79)
MFF1 input configuration (0=thermofuse 1=flue temperature probe 2=condensate alarm 3=0..10Vinput 4=NU Default=0)
MFF2 input configuration (0=thermofuse 1=flue temperature probe 2=condensate alarm 3=0..10Vinput 4=NU Default=1)
MFF3 input configuration (0=thermofuse 1=flue temperature probe 2=condensate alarm 3=0..10Vinput 4=NU Default=4)
Failure number (00 last failure - 06 first failure)
N° of days between actual board time and time when failure was activated
System state (0=standby 1=DHW ON 2=CSF 3=CH ON 4=PreHEAT ON 5=CH no frost ON 6=DHW no frost ON 7=postcirculation 8=Thermostatic postcirculation)
CH temperature when failure was activated
Lockout number (00 is last failure 06 is first failure)
